Chapter 17 

     14-16 (1 Samuel 15:2, 3). Amalek Doomed to Destruction.--Many years before, God had appointed Amalek to utter destruction. They had lifted up their hands against God, and His throne, and had taken oath 
                                                                           1103
by their gods that Israel should be utterly consumed, and the God of Israel brought down so that He would not be able to deliver them out of their hands.
